Benefits of working with GlobalOpt

Offices in China and Russia
Offices are located in Moscow, the capital of Russia. And in Guangzhou, China's world trade metropolis.

We declare the goods with optimization
We are going to meet our customers and help to clear the goods with the optimization of codes and rates.

Qualified staff
Our employees have extensive experience in logistics with China and are fluent in Chinese and English.

We are looking for manufacturers
We help our customers find the product or manufacturer you are interested in in China.

Own warehouse in China
Warehouse in China allows us to collect and inspect and pack your goods before shipping.

Money transfer to China
We help to transfer and pay for goods in China on preferential terms

We make wholesale deliveries
We take care of all the issues associated with the purchase, quality control, logistics and customs clearance. You only need to fill out the terms of reference, approve samples of goods and then accept the goods in your warehouse!

Production trip to China
We have extensive experience in business trips around China. With great joy and desire, we will organize such a trip to China. We will make a visa, transfer from the airport, reserve a hotel, provide an interpreter. We organize a trip to production. Shop tour. Furniture tour.

Our job - is more than just delivery
We organize transportation from China - quickly and reliably, taking into account the characteristics of the cargo. and your time and budget requirements.
Cargo insurance
All shipments, the logistics of which are carried out by Global Opt, are insured. We guarantee full reimbursement of the cost of the goods in cases stipulated by the insurance agreement. Our company takes care of all your worries.
Logistics of the last mile
We deliver your goods to a specific address. The delivery is agreed by the managers by telephone, preliminary one day and one hour before delivery. We also provide the services of movers at the place of delivery.
We always look forward
The philosophy of our company is to make ourselves and our partners around the world successful and rich. Therefore, we are always open to dialogue on partnership and investment.

Agent in China

Russian-speaking representatives of the company can easily find exactly the product that will meet your needs both in quality and price.
